explains: n. 自助；自救；自立；互助

sentences.en: She set up a self-help group for parents with overweight children.
sentences.cn: 她成立了一个由超重儿童家长组成的互助会。

sentences.en: A major function of self-help networks is financial support.
sentences.cn: 自助网络的一个主要功能是提供经济支持。

sentences.en: There's a self-help group for students who have issues with study.
sentences.cn: 为学习有困难的同学设立了一个自助小组。
